body.name: 4 in 1 Montessori Toys for 2 3 4 Year Old Boys Girls, Educational Magnetic Color & Number Maze, Fine Motor Skills Wooden Letter Tracing, Shape Sorting Puzzle Gift, Toddler Learning Activities
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 38 mins
features: 【4 IN 1 MONTESSORI LEARNING TOYS】This montessori toys for 3-4 year old includes Shape & Number Sorting Game, Magnetic Color & Number Maze, and Alphabet Practice board. The bright colors and cute design can attract kid's attention and this preschool learning toys is highly educational, allowing kids to learn colors, counting, numbers and shapes while playing.

【FINE MOTOR SKILLS FOR KIDS】The magnetic color and number maze is perfect for improving fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination for kids by placing the different colored magnetic beads one by one through the maze in the correct position. At the same time this wooden puzzles can cultivate your child's patience and exercise reaction.

【WOODEN LETTER TRACING BOARD】Perfect size for alphabet practice, help your kids to promote handwriting ability. It has upper case letters on the left and lower case on the right. Each alphabet has directional arrows to help the proper order and direction of the strokes. The toddler can see where they should start each line and the direction.

【SAFE & DURABLE NATURAL WOOD】Made of natural basswood with a smooth surface and non-toxic water-based paint. The high-quality acrylic sheet makes the sorting toys sturdy and durable, and the magnetic beads won't fall out and cause harm to children. All the edges are smooth and burr-free, make your child have fun and use it with peace of mind.

【PERFECT GIFT & 1 YEAR WARRANTY】Our educational toys are perfect Christmas and birthday gift toys for 3 4 year old boys girls. Meanwhile, all of Candey toys include one-year warranty, if there is any problem or you are not satisfied with our products you can contact us at any time. Don’t hesitate and ADD TO CART now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is for 3 yr plus toddlers.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my son’s coming birthday. He is going to learn numbers and letters from this Montessori toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice learning toy with multiple options
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality toy with quality smooth painted wooden numbers and shapes. Colors are vibrant and as pictured. Wood "pencil" is tethered so you don't loose it and even has a storage spot to stow away. letters and numbers on the back side show arrows for instructing kids how to draw the letter or number and each one has a depressed area for tracing with the wooden "pencil". The magnetic ball sorting is fun even if your child isn't old enough to sort by color and improves fine motor skills. This is a great toy for car rides!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps them focused
reviews.reviewText: My grandsons favorite thing to play with right now. Very educational and great activity.driven. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All wood toy set!
reviews.reviewText: This toy set is all wood and is very durable to withstand hours of play. It is an educational set and kids can play but learn at the same time. I would recommend this toy set for any kids or teacher. Great product! Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy
reviews.reviewText: This puzzle was nice and educational for my toddler nephew! It kept him busy and he loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3 year old nephew to play with at my house. He and his 7 year old sister both liked playing with it. It's a toy that exercises colors, numbers, and letters. The bottom part, where he's using a magnetic stick to move little balls into different slots, seemed a bit complicated.My only real complaint was that the little balls were not packaged in any type of plastic baggie, so during shipping and while I was bringing it inside or moving it around, the balls were rolling around in their little area and making noise. There was no problem with them falling out and disappearing since that part of the toy has a cover, but it was a small noise nuisance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great learning game
reviews.reviewText: I like this educational game. My child loved it especially playing with the magnets. The letters are in the back it took me a minute to find them lol. Overall good quality just wished the shapes and numbers had magnets to prevent them from getting lost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fun and learning for hours. Excellent quality, material, and durability. Easy to use. Magnetic pen works great. Great size for travelers.
